Hellplague:
 
"No, that's fine.  Take the panels down and melt them down and install the new ones as fast as you can without sacrificing structural integrity.  Don't get sloppy, they may need to take as much of a beating as they can if it comes to it."

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
"This should be enough to patch several of the large holes... it
probably wont take much punishment, but it shouldn't be too obvious
that this was not this was not the original mold.  I think it would be
a good idea just to melt down this entire pannel and make a new one,
that way we will be sure to have enough metal....and the whole thing
will be much stronger.... Assuming you have no problems with me
removing the damaged panels?"

Celeron looked like he enjoyed this work very much, almost too much.  :-)


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

__________________________________________________
